Csv - Interface in com.douglasjose.tech.csv
Data structure to represent a CSV (comma separated values) file as a matrix in memory.

Utility class used to create Csv implementations based in a specific format.
CsvParser - Interface in com.douglasjose.tech.csv
The CsvParser class contains the functionality required to persist the Csv data structure.
